    • Constructor Detail

      • GroupController

        public GroupController​(GroupRepository groupRepository,
                       GroupLdapRepository groupLdapRepository,
                       @Value("${bremersee.groupman.local-role:ROLE_LOCAL_USER}")
                       java.lang.String localRole)
        Instantiates a new group controller.
        Parameters:
        groupRepository - the group repository
        groupLdapRepository - the group ldap repository
        localRole - if a role name is given, ldap will only be called, if the user has this role; if the role name is null or empty, ldap will always be called
